羅傑斯認為Top是一個勇敢而且非常積極的人。這是他第一次在沒有父親的情況下領導球隊。羅傑斯表示：“當我進入俱樂部時，我向Top展示的願景非常簡單，我們可以贏得盡可能多的冠軍。所以，我們不要迴避它，我們想贏，這就是我來到這裡的原因。我們要捍衛維猜實現過的目標，並在未來取得進一步的成功。”

我感覺小維猜佢真係想隊波升lv
諗野完全唔係中下游果個維度
即係如果渣土係走去教修咸頓般茅水晶宮果啲

不過，萊斯特城堅稱他們要留住隊內的關鍵球員，並強調英超Big6不用想著試圖挖角了。
麥迪遜本賽季在英超中表現搶眼，有消息稱熱刺在關注他。不過，萊斯特城老闆阿亞瓦特和羅傑斯堅稱，如果有豪門球隊想要簽下這些和球隊簽署了長約的球員，俱樂部不會向求購者退縮。
鏡報稱，阿亞瓦特准備拒絕任何他們不想要完成的轉會，他希望把球隊打造成一股舉足輕重的力量，羅傑斯也獲得了保證，萊斯特城不會是一家靠賣球員盈利的俱樂部。

【Now Sports-體育】據英國《太陽報》報道，車路士中場真禾特與一名剛認識的美女律師一起離開派對後，涉嫌酒後駕駛被捕。

29歲的真禾特（Danny Drinkwater）於周一早上駕駛著他的Range Rover離開派對，開車數分鐘後他在曼徹斯特黑爾的鄉間小路上，撞到一架Skoda，出事地點留下了碎片，柵欄被夷為平地。當時車上還載著美女律師貝絲，事後真禾特涉嫌酒後駕駛而被捕。

一位消息人士說，「這是一場嚴重的事故。丹尼在酒吧度過了一個美好的夜晚，但結局非常糟糕。他撞到的汽車碎片飛了起來。丹尼最近一直在瘋狂地參加派對，但希望這將是一個警醒，讓他放慢速度。」

柴郡警方說：「一名29歲男子涉嫌酒後駕車被捕，他目前仍在扣押，協助警方調查。」值得一提的是，這場事故發生在車路士以2:0擊敗韋斯咸的英超比賽數小時前。

馬古尼：羅渣士令李城進步

【Now Sports-體育】哈利馬古尼認為，羅渣士入主李斯特城不但令球隊進步，也培育出一眾球員的信心，是一位不折不扣的好主帥。

羅渣士（Brendan Rodgers）入主李斯特城後已帶領球隊取得5戰4勝佳績，對於這位新帥，李城後衛哈利馬古尼（Harry Maguire）有讚冇彈：「他是一位大大提升了己隊水平的好領隊，引進他，展示了球會的雄心壯志，他培育了球員們的信心，並協助年輕球員過度。另外他在訓練場下了不少功夫，其人事管理能力亦屬頂級，真的為球隊帶來了重大改變。」

「過去4場比賽，己隊開始取得了有保證的賽果，在多場比賽中，己隊都率先入球，那是非常重要的，之後我們就可以取得第2和第3球，己隊真的表現很好，我認為我們值得勝出任何一場比賽。」

李城周六將會主場迎戰紐卡素爭取5連勝，然而，馬古尼坦言客軍絕對不易應付：「我認為他們是難以被擊敗，他們失球不多，即使戰敗亦失球不多，他們大概會守在後場嘗試打反擊。紐卡素是一支好球隊，有著一位了不起的領隊，這將會是惡戰一場。」

曼市打吡】馬列斯頂唔順一件事嗌走

曼聯中場保羅普巴經常想轉會跳槽，原來曼城都有一位貴價球星嗌要走人，就係右翼馬列斯。呢位28歲阿爾及利亞國腳上年夏天以6000萬鎊轉會費，由李斯特城加盟曼城，成為曼城史上最貴收購。

不過，馬列斯今季喺曼城，多數時間屈居後備，令佢非常不滿，有傳佢已經提出轉會要求。雖然領隊哥迪奧拿聲稱馬列斯唔會走，但以呢位翼鋒過去嘅紀錄，恐怕會令哥帥失望。

因為馬列斯之前為咗轉投曼城，不惜玩失蹤，最終令李斯特城屈服，如果佢一心要離隊，睇怕曼城難以留人。馬列斯搞咁多嘢，先至可以加盟曼城，估唔到未夠一季就想走人，認真諷刺。

【轉會講場】FM妖星泰利文斯唔留隊：想返摩納哥

在今年一月以借將身份加盟英超球隊李斯特城的比利時中場泰利文斯在接受訪問時稱，他並不想在球季結束後加盟這支前英超冠軍球隊，而是想回到原屬球會摩納哥，繼續其職業生涯。

這名現年22歲的比利時中場稱：「在這半季中，我對李斯特城這支球隊、這個地方留下了深刻的印象，我喜歡這裡。但在球季完結後，我想回到摩納哥效力，因為我屬於那一個地方。在夏天我就會回到法國，如果一切都沒意外的話。」泰利文斯在2017年以2100萬鎊由比甲球隊安德列治加盟摩納哥，在摩納哥踢了兩季，一直都是球隊主力。而李城領隊羅渣士就很想簽下這名[比利時新星，傳聞李城已為此子向摩納哥送出正式報價。

泰利文斯今季以借將身份效力李城，在英超上陣12場射入三球，表現出色。比利時人的遠射能力了得，踢法機動且有一定的覆蓋能力，推進、傳球能力也很不錯。除了李城外，剛打入歐聯決賽的英超球隊熱刺也對此子很感興趣，意欲簽下泰利文斯來頂替一月離隊的丹比利。

咁又係嘅，摩納哥就算今季點差都好，都叫做法甲豪門
有得爭冠軍打歐戰，同李城呢啲小球會吸引力無得比

Everton & Leicester City show interest in RB Leipzig striker Jean-Kévin Augustin

Premier League clubs Everton and Leicester City are interested in signing RB Leipzig forward Jean-Kévin Augustin, according to the Telegraph.

Neither club are yet to make the Bundesliga club a formal offer for the 21-year-old Frenchman but with just 382 minutes of league football played this season, he could well be on the move.

The report suggests that RB Leipzig may be willing to listen to offers around €20 million, but it may also depend on the plans of Julian Nagelsmann, who will arrive as head coach of the club in the summer.

It was also reported by Kicker in April that RB Leipzig may be open to selling Augustin.

Leicester close in on £56m pair Youri Tielemans and Ayoze Perez as they stand firm over Harry Maguire

Brendan Rodgers is closing in on the £40million club record capture of Youri Tielemans, with Newcastle striker Ayoze Perez also set to sign for Leicester.

Tielemans’ protracted move to Leicester could finally be completed by early next week as negotiations with Monaco reach a conclusion.

Leicester have been in talks for weeks over a deal to sign the Belgium international, who impressed on loan at the King Power Stadium over the second half of the season, and it is understood that it is now progressing towards a positive outcome.

Telegraph Sport understands Tielemans, 22, is keen to start his pre-season with Leicester next week and is relishing the prospect to begin a new chapter in his career under Rodgers.

Leicester also expect to sign Perez in the next 48 hours, with the Spanish forward undergoing a medical at the club’s training ground on Wednesday.

Rodgers has moved for Perez to offer further support and competition for Jamie Vardy, in a deal which will be perceived as another huge blow to Newcastle’s supporters.

Perez will cost a fee of around £16m, which was his release clause at Newcastle, and personal terms will be a formality.

Leicester have already signed Luton defender James Justin for an initial £6m and are also considering a move for a winger.

Harry Maguire, the defender, is a target for both Manchester clubs but they will have to pay over £90million to sign him.

Maguire returns for pr­e-season training next week and Leicester will continue to adopt a hardline stance over his future.

Leicester will listen to offers for fringe players, including previous record signing Islam Slimani, Adrien Silva and Andy King.

https://www.telegraph.co.uk/football/2019/07/03/leicester-close-56m-pair-youri-tielemans-ayoze-perez-stand-firm/?WT.mc_id=tmg_share_tw

Tielemans rejects United
Youri Tielemans is prepared to snub Manchester United in favour of a move to Leicester City, after it was revealed talks between the two clubs were progressing.
The Foxes have been desperate to bring back their loan star on a permanent basis, and despite interest from United and others, they remain favourites for his signature.
Belgian football expert Kristoff Terreur has told Sky Sports that a deal for the 22-year-old is close, although it is complicated by a potential part-swap with Andre Silva.
Although Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is understood to be a big admirer of the midfielder, their priority is a new defender, which could see them miss out on this signing.
Likelihood: Well, why would you sign for United over Leicester?

TIELEMANS GAVE UP UNITED CHANCE

Youri Tielemans gave up the chance of a possible move to Manchester United, and told his agent he wanted to sign for Leicester City now, rather than delaying in case Ole Gunnar Solskjaer made a bid for him, Sky Sports News has learned.

Tieleman's agent was keen to wait, in case bigger clubs came in with an offer for the Belgian international. In particular, he wanted to see what happens with Paul Pogba at Old Trafford before committing Tielemans' future - a number of reports have suggested United were looking at the 22-year-old as a possible replacement, should Pogba leave for Juventus or Real Madrid.

https://readleicester.com/2019/07/09/callum-mcgregor-ready-to-leave-celtic-for-leicester-city-switch/

Celtic star Callum McGregor is ready to leave his current side to reunite with Brendan Rodgers at Leicester City, according to Football Insider.

The report suggests that the 26-year-old is keen on a move to the King Power Stadium, with the Foxes ready to start the bidding for the Scot at £15 million.

Leicester boss Rodgers is keen on bringing McGregor to the club ahead of the new season, however, after spending big money on Youri Tielemans and Ayoze Perez, a potential move could be dependent on Harry Maguire’s possible move to Manchester United.
McGregor flourished under the Northern Irishman during a three-year relationship at Celtic Park, becoming one of the best performers in the Scottish Premiership.

The versatile midfielder has turned out 224 times for his boyhood club since turning professional in 2013, and McGregor may not be adding many more appearances to that tally if Leicester firm up their interest in the coming weeks.
